sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import Axios from 'axios' export default function LoginForm() { const url="https://localhost:44313/api/Auth/login"; const [data,setData]=useState({ userName: "", password: "", }) function submit(e) { e.preventDefault(); Axios.post(url,{ userName:data.userName, password:data.password }) .t } return (
submit(e)} className="login-form">
  • Forgot Password?
) }
